short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for highlighted text in Workday

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to highlight text in your browser and perform actions in workday on the text by right clicking, such as search, or proxy-as.  Particularly useful for finding people in workday directly from your email.
